Body: Possible Duplicate:  What’s the easiest way to create a QR code for a link?  I searched the site, and I've searched google with no answer. Posting QR code images on a webpage is convenient, because a person can just point their phone at their screen to download a new app. Where can I get the QR code for an app on the Play Store?
Title: Where can I get the QR code for an app on the Play Store?

history.Text: I searched the site, and I've searched google with no answer. Posting QR code images on a webpage is convenient, because a person can just point their phone at their screen to download a new app. Where can I get the QR code for an app on the Play Store?
